price: 111. Diggah asaaku Anu Yi-naqoosak tama teemene butta jannatal ken gaita, sin adaa kee Yallih taaqatal yisbireenimih sabbatah, diggah usun Jannatal yaffoofe mara (limaye mara) yekken.
arabic: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innī jazaytuhumu al-yawma bimā ṣabarū annahum humu al-fāizūna
